#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
    #endif // ONLINE_JUDGE
    int n,t;
    vector<int> v;
    while(true){
        cin>>n;
        if (n==0){return 0;}
        v.clear();
        for (int i=0; i<n; i++){
            cin>>t;
            v.push_back(t);
        }
        sort(v.begin(), v.end());
        int ans = 0;
        for (int i=0; i<n; i++){
            for (int j=i+1; j<n; j++){
                int sum = v[i]+v[j];
                vector<int>::iterator it = upper_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), sum);
                if (it==v.end()){continue;}
                int id = it - v.begin();
                //cout<<"for sum, id = "<<sum<<" "<<id<<endl;
                int gg = n - id ;
                //cout<<"gg = "<<gg<<endl;
                ans+=gg;
            }
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
}
